credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Fork
description: Two long straight tines, rounded shoulders, spiral shaped neck. Brass ferrule doubly waisted with a central plain octagonal moulding engraved with decorative geometrical pattern. Tapering handle, octagonal in section; mother-of-pearl with engraved scrolled foliage, rounded top with writhen knob finial of brass.
name: Fork
